messages.content:
can you improve this message sent to someone who just bought our assam oud essential oil on our etsy apge? Bonjour Alberto!

Your order is flying out towards you - get your nose ready to enjoy a sensory trip with your new smell :)
If you'd like, you can sign up for our newsletter so we can let you know when we have coupons, new items and collaborations coming. You'll also get a 15% discount off your next order: http://bit.ly/NCSLetter 

Have a sweet day!
+NCS

Subject: ðŸŒ¿ Your Assam Oud Essential Oil Journey Begins Now, Alberto!

Dear Alberto,

Exciting news! Your premium Assam Oud essential oil is now on its flight path towards you. Soon, you'll be embarking on an aromatic journey, unlike anything you've ever experienced. Prepare to immerse your senses in the mystical allure of Assam.

To enrich your sensory adventure, we invite you to join our esteemed newsletter community. Not only will it keep you up-to-date with our latest releases and exclusive collaborations, but you will also get privileged access to promotional events and special discounts. As a token of our appreciation, you'll receive a 15% discount off your next order immediately upon sign-up: http://bit.ly/NCSLetter 

Let the sensory journey unfold, and may it bring a touch of the extraordinary into your everyday life.

Wishing you a day filled with delightful aromas,

The NCS Team
It clips at exclusive because i have a word cap

Subject: ðŸŒ¿ Assam Oud Essential Oil Adventure Begins, Alberto!

Dear Alberto,

Great news! Your Assam Oud essential oil is en route. Prepare for an aromatic voyage, steeped in the mystical allure of Assam.

Consider joining our newsletter community. Stay updated with new releases and enjoy special promotions. Sign up now and get a 15% discount on your next order: http://bit.ly/NCSLetter 

Immerse yourself in the extraordinary,

The NCS Team
can you ask for a 5 star review saying we're a small family business it'd mean a lot to us?

Subject: ðŸŒ¿ Your Assam Oud Adventure Begins, Alberto!

Dear Alberto,

Great news! Your Assam Oud essential oil is now airborne and soon will arrive at your doorstep. Get ready for an aromatic journey that captures the mystical allure of Assam.

We're a small family-run business, and your experience means everything to us. If you find our product and service satisfying, could you kindly leave a 5-star review? Your feedback not only helps us grow, but it also supports other customers in making informed choices.

Don't forget to join our newsletter community. Stay updated with new releases and enjoy special promotions. Plus, a 15% discount awaits on your next order upon sign-up: http://bit.ly/NCSLetter 

To a world filled with extraordinary aromas,

The NCS Team

Subject: ðŸŒ¿ Your Scent-sational Journey Begins, Daniel!

Dear Daniel,

Bonjour! Your highly-anticipated order is soaring through the skies towards you! Brace yourself for an extraordinary sensory expedition filled with enchanting new aromas.

To ensure you don't miss out on any of our fragrant adventures, we invite you to join our exclusive newsletter community. It's the best way to stay informed about our unique offerings, special collaborations, and exclusive promotions. As a token of our appreciation for embarking on this aromatic journey with us, we're gifting you a 15% discount on your next order upon signing up: http://bit.ly/NCSLetter 

Wishing you a day as delightful as the scents that await you,

The NCS Team
